snippet: China's economic growth slowed in the third quarter to its weakest since the 2008/09 global financial crisis as a slumping property market dragged on manufacturing and investment, adding to concerns about flagging global growth....

headline.print_headline: China Posts Slowest Growth Since Global Crisis, More Stimulus Expected
headline.main: China Posts Slowest Growth Since Global Crisis, More Stimulus Expected

lead_paragraph: China's economic growth slowed in the third quarter to its weakest since the 2008/09 global financial crisis as a slumping property market dragged on manufacturing and investment, adding to concerns about flagging global growth.
